title: [Vipershroud, Locksmehr River]
description: Moonlight sparkles off the Locksmehr River as it rushes toward the west.  The current is very fast here, and the flow is interrupted by several protruding rocks.  To the east, a ferry service for crossing the river operates from a sturdy wooden dock.  The Vipershroud, a near impenetrable forest, looms to the south and west.

Sunlight sparkles off the Locksmehr River as it rushes toward the west.  The current is very fast here, and the flow is interrupted by several protruding rocks.  To the east, a ferry service for crossing the river operates from a sturdy wooden dock.  The Vipershroud, a near impenetrable forest, looms to the south and west.
